title: What is the process to recall an elected official from Washington?
text:
Generally, we focus on local issues in Southeastern North Carolina.
However, there is no Constitutional provision for recalling elected
federal officials. For more, here's a link to a report from
Congressional Research Services:

http://lugar.senate.gov/services/pdf_crs/Recall_of_Legislators_and_the_Removal_of_Members_of_Congress_from_Office.pdf
